subject: Concussions
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The players, who were in the league in the 1970s, ’80s and ’90s, filed their suit in federal court on Monday, which comes about three months after the N.F.L. agreed to settle a similar case.
